text: Alexa Chung appeared to confirm her relationship with Alexander Skarsg√•rd is back on after returning to London with the Swedish actor on Sunday. The couple, who reportedly ended their two - year relationship last June, made their way across St. Pancras International train station after arriving in the English capital via Eurostar. Alexa, 34, sported a hooded top beneath a fitted winter coat while walking alongside Alexander, 41, best known for his role in HBO fantasy drama True Blood.
